   19: %%
   20: -module(zstd_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([bulk/1, bulk_with_dict/1,
   26:          pledge/1,
   27:          cstream/1, cstream_with_dict/1,
   28:          dstream/1, dstream_with_dict/1,
   29:          parameters/1, dict_api/1,
   30:          doc_tests/1
   31:         ]).
   32: 
   33: -export([generate_dict/0]).
   34: 
   35: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   36: 
   37: suite() -> [].
   38: 
   39: all() ->
   40:     [{group, zstd}].
   41: 
   42: groups() ->
   43:     [{zstd, [parallel],
   44:       [bulk,
   45:        cstream,
   46:        pledge,
   47:        dstream,
   48:        parameters,
   49:        {group, dict} ]},
   50:      {dict, [parallel],
   51:       [ bulk_with_dict,
   52:         cstream_with_dict,
   53:         dstream_with_dict,
   54:         dict_api,
   55:         doc_tests ]} ].
   56: 
   57: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: generate_dict() ->
   61:     DataDir = filename:join([os:getenv("ERL_TOP"), "lib", "stdlib",
   62:                              "test", "zstd_SUITE_data"]),
   63:     ok = filelib:ensure_path(DataDir),
   64:     TrainingSetDir = filename:join(DataDir,"training"),
   65:     Dict = filename:join(DataDir, "dict"),
   66:     ok = file:make_dir(TrainingSetDir),
   67:     generate_training_set(TrainingSetDir, 1_000),
   68:     io:format("~ts~n",[os:cmd("zstd --train " ++
   69:                                   TrainingSetDir ++ "/* -o " ++ Dict)]),
   70:     file:del_dir_r(TrainingSetDir),
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: generate_training_set(_Dir, 0) -> [];
   74: generate_training_set(Dir, N) ->
   75:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir, integer_to_list(N)),
   76:                          lists:duplicate(rand:uniform(10000), integer_to_list(N))),
   77:     generate_training_set(Dir, N - 1).
   78: 
   79: init_per_group(dict, Config) ->
   80:     Dict = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   81:                          "dict"),
   82: 
   83:     [{dict, Dict} | Config];
   84: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
   88:     Config.
   89: 
   90: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   91:     ok.
   92: 
   93: bulk(_Config) ->
   94: 
   95:     Data = ~"abc",
   96:     Compressed = zstd:compress(Data),
   97:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed))),
   98: 
   99:     Compressed = zstd:compress(binary_to_list(Data)),
  100:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed))),
  101: 
  102:     Compressed = zstd:compress([Data]),
  103:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed))),
  104: 
  105:     %% Test decompressing of multiple frames
  106:     DoubleCompressed = [zstd:compress([Data]), zstd:compress([Data])],
  107:     ?assertEqual(<<Data/binary,Data/binary>>,
  108:                  iob(zstd:decompress(DoubleCompressed))),
  109: 
  110:     %% Test compression of a large amount of data
  111:     Iter = lists:seq(0,1_000_000),
  112:     IOV = lists:duplicate(10, iob([rand:uniform(255) || _ <- Iter])),
  113:     IOVCompressed = zstd:compress(IOV, #{ compressionLevel => -20 }),
  114:     ?assertEqual(iob(IOV), iob(zstd:decompress(IOVCompressed))),
  115: 
  116:     ok.
  117: 
  118: bulk_with_dict(Config) ->
  119: 
  120:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  121:     Data = ~"abc",
  122: 
  123:     Compressed = zstd:compress(Data, #{ dictionary => Dict }),
  124:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed, #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  125: 
  126:     CDict = zstd:create_compress_dict(Dict),
  127:     DDict = zstd:create_decompress_dict(Dict),
  128:     Compressed = zstd:compress(Data, #{ dictionary => CDict }),
  129:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed, #{ dictionary => DDict }))),
  130: 
  131:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Dictionary mismatch"},_}} =
  132:         catch zstd:decompress(Compressed),
  133: 
  134:     ok.
  135: 
  136: cstream(_Config) ->
  137: 
  138:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress),
  139: 
  140:     Data = ~"aaa",
  141: 
  142:     {done, C1} = zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  143:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(C1))),
  144: 
  145:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  146:     {continue, C2_2} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  147:     {done, C2_3} = zstd:finish(CCtx, ~"a"),
  148:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C2_1, C2_2, C2_3]))),
  149: 
  150:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  151:     ok = zstd:reset(CCtx),
  152:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, [~"aaa"]),
  153:     {done, C3_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, <<>>),
  154:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C3_1, C3_2]))),
  155: 
  156:     %% Test compression of a large amount of data
  157:     LargeData = iob([rand:uniform(255) || _ <- lists:seq(0,1_000_000)]),
  158:     {continue, Remain, C4_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, LargeData),
  159:     {done, C4_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, [Remain]),
  160:     ?assertEqual(iob([LargeData]), iob(zstd:decompress([C4_1,C4_2]))),
  161: 
  162:     {done, C5_1} = zstd:finish(CCtx, [LargeData, LargeData]),
  163:     ?assertEqual(iob([LargeData, LargeData]), iob(zstd:decompress([C5_1]))),
  164: 
  165:     ok = zstd:close(CCtx),
  166:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  167: 
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: pledge(_Config) ->
  171: 
  172:     AAAAs = iob(lists:duplicate(10_000, $a)),
  173:     BBBBs = iob(lists:duplicate(10_000, $b)),
  174: 
  175:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress),
  176:     {continue, C1_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  177:     {done, C1_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, BBBBs),
  178: 
  179:     {ok, #{ frameContentSize := undefined } } = zstd:get_frame_header([C1_1, C1_2]),
  180:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>,
  181:                  iob(zstd:decompress([<<Byte>> || <<Byte>> <= iob([C1_1,C1_2])]))),
  182:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>, iob(zstd:decompress(iob([C1_1,C1_2])))),
  183: 
  184:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, pledgedSrcSize, 20_000 ),
  185:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  186:     {done, C2_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, BBBBs),
  187: 
  188:     {ok, #{ frameContentSize := 20_000 } } = zstd:get_frame_header([C2_1, C2_2]),
  189:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>,
  190:                  iob(zstd:decompress([<<Byte>> || <<Byte>> <= iob([C2_1, C2_2])]))),
  191:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>, iob(zstd:decompress(iob([C2_1, C2_2])))),
  192: 
  193:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, pledgedSrcSize, 20 ),
  194:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Src size is incorrect"},_}} = catch zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  195: 
  196:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, pledgedSrcSize, 20_001 ),
  197:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  198:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Src size is incorrect"},_}} = catch zstd:finish(CCtx, BBBBs),
  199: 
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: cstream_with_dict(Config) ->
  203: 
  204:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  205:     DictID = zstd:get_dict_id(Dict),
  206:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress),
  207: 
  208:     zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, dictionary, Dict),
  209: 
  210:     Data = ~"aaa",
  211:     {done, C1} = zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  212:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(C1, #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  213:     DictID = zstd:get_dict_id(C1),
  214: 
  215:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  216:     {continue, C2_2} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  217:     {done, C2_3} = zstd:finish(CCtx, ~"a"),
  218:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C2_1, C2_2, C2_3], #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  219: 
  220:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  221:     ok = zstd:reset(CCtx),
  222:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  223:     {done, C3_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, <<>>),
  224:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C3_1, C3_2], #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  225: 
  226:     zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, dictionary, ""),
  227: 
  228:     {done, C4} = zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  229:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(C4))),
  230:     0 = zstd:get_dict_id(C4),
  231: 
  232:     {continue, C4_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  233:     {continue, C4_2} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  234:     {done, C4_3} = zstd:finish(CCtx, ~"a"),
  235:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C4_1, C4_2, C4_3]))),
  236: 
  237:     {continue, C5_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  238:     ok = zstd:reset(CCtx),
  239:     {continue, C5_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  240:     {done, C5_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, <<>>),
  241:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C5_1, C5_2]))),
  242: 
  243:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Dictionary mismatch"}, _}} =
  244:         catch iob(zstd:decompress(iob([C1, C4]))),
  245: 
  246:     ok.
  247: 
  248: dstream(_Config) ->
  249: 
  250:     {ok, DCtx} = zstd:context(decompress),
  251: 
  252:     Data = ~"aaa",
  253:     CompressedData = zstd:compress(Data),
  254:     {First, Last} = lists:split(4, binary_to_list(iob(CompressedData))),
  255: 
  256:     {done, D1} = zstd:finish(DCtx, CompressedData),
  257:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(D1)),
  258: 
  259:     {continue, D2_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  260:     {done, D2_2} = zstd:finish(DCtx, Last),
  261:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob([D2_1, D2_2])),
  262: 
  263:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  264:     ok = zstd:reset(DCtx),
  265:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, [First]),
  266:     {continue, D3_2} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, Last),
  267:     {done, D3_3} = zstd:finish(DCtx, <<>>),
  268:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob([D3_1, D3_2, D3_3])),
  269: 
  270:     ok = zstd:close(DCtx),
  271:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch zstd:finish(DCtx, Data),
  272: 
  273:     ok.
  274: 
  275: dstream_with_dict(Config) ->
  276: 
  277:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  278:     {ok, DCtx} = zstd:context(decompress),
  279: 
  280:     Data = ~"aaa",
  281:     CompressedData = zstd:compress(Data, #{ dictionary => Dict }),
  282:     {First, Last} = lists:split(4, binary_to_list(iob(CompressedData))),
  283: 
  284:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(DCtx, dictionary, Dict),
  285: 
  286:     {done, D1} = zstd:finish(DCtx, CompressedData),
  287:     Data = iob(D1),
  288: 
  289:     {continue, D2_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  290:     {done, D2_2} = zstd:finish(DCtx, Last),
  291:     Data = iob([D2_1, D2_2]),
  292: 
  293:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  294:     ok = zstd:reset(DCtx),
  295:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, [First]),
  296:     {continue, D3_2} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, Last),
  297:     {done, D3_3} = zstd:finish(DCtx, <<>>),
  298:     Data =  iob([D3_1, D3_2, D3_3]),
  299: 
  300:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(DCtx, dictionary, <<>>),
  301:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Dictionary mismatch"}, _}} =
  302:         catch zstd:finish(DCtx, CompressedData),
  303: 
  304:     ok.
  305: 
  306: parameters(_Config) ->
  307: 
  308:     {ok, CCxt} = zstd:context(compress),
  309: 
  310:     CParams = [{compressionLevel, 5},
  311:                {windowLog, 10},
  312:                {hashLog, 6},
  313:                {chainLog, 6},
  314:                {searchLog, 1},
  315:                {minMatch, 5},
  316:                {targetLength, 5},
  317:                {strategy, fast},
  318:                {targetCBlockSize, 5},
  319:                {enableLongDistanceMatching, true},
  320:                {ldmHashLog, 6},
  321:                {ldmMinMatch, 6},
  322:                {ldmBucketSizeLog, 5},
  323:                {ldmHashRateLog, 5},
  324:                {contentSizeFlag, false},
  325:                {checksumFlag, true},
  326:                {dictIDFlag, false}],
  327: 
  328:     %% Check that we can get default parameters
  329:     [case {Key, zstd:get_parameter(CCxt, Key)} of
  330:          {Key, V} when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  331:              ok;
  332:          {Key, V} when is_boolean(V), is_boolean(Value)  ->
  333:              ok;
  334:          {Key, V} when is_atom(V), is_atom(Value) ->
  335:              ok
  336:      end || {Key, Value} <- CParams],
  337: 
  338:     %% Set all available parameters
  339:     [ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCxt, Key, Value) || {Key, Value} <- CParams],
  340: 
  341:     %% Check that we can get the non-default parameters
  342:     %% We cannot check that the actual values are correct as zstd
  343:     %% changes some of them when set.
  344:     [case {Key, zstd:get_parameter(CCxt, Key)} of
  345:          {Key, V} when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  346:              ok;
  347:          {Key, V} when is_boolean(V), is_boolean(Value)  ->
  348:              ok;
  349:          {Key, V} when is_atom(V), is_atom(Value) ->
  350:              ok
  351:      end || {Key, Value} <- CParams],
  352: 
  353:     zstd:close(CCxt),
  354: 
  355:     {ok, DCxt} = zstd:context(decompress),
  356: 
  357:     DParams = [{windowLogMax, 10}],
  358: 
  359:     %% Check that we can get default parameters
  360:     [case zstd:get_parameter(DCxt, Key) of
  361:          V when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  362:              ok
  363:      end || {Key, Value} <- DParams],
  364: 
  365:     %% Set all available parameters
  366:     [ok = zstd:set_parameter(DCxt, Key, Value) || {Key, Value} <- DParams],
  367: 
  368:     %% Check that we can get the non-default parameters
  369:     %% We cannot check that the actual values are correct as zstd
  370:     %% changes some of them when set.
  371:     [case zstd:get_parameter(DCxt, Key) of
  372:          V when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  373:              ok
  374:      end || {Key, Value} <- DParams],
  375: 
  376:     zstd:close(DCxt),
  377: 
  378:     ok.
  379: 
  380: dict_api(Config) ->
  381: 
  382:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  383:     DictId = zstd:get_dict_id(Dict),
  384: 
  385:     CDict = zstd:create_compress_dict(Dict, -5),
  386:     DictId = zstd:get_dict_id(CDict),
  387: 
  388:     DDict = zstd:create_decompress_dict(Dict),
  389:     DictId = zstd:get_dict_id(DDict),
  390: 
  391:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress, #{ dictionary => CDict }),
  392:     {'EXIT', _} = catch zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, dictionary, DDict),
  393: 
  394:     {ok, DCtx} = zstd:context(decompress, #{ dictionary => DDict }),
  395:     {'EXIT', _} = catch zstd:set_parameter(DCtx, dictionary, CDict),
  396: 
  397:     ok.
  398: 
  399: 
  400: doc_tests(Config) ->
  401:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  402:     shell_docs:test(
  403:       zstd,
  404:       [{{function, get_dict_id, 1},
  405:         erl_eval:add_binding('Dict', Dict, erl_eval:new_bindings())}]
  406:      ).
  407: 
  408: iob(IOList) ->
  409:     erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOList).
